PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-10582020-12-14,  ,  ,  ,  IC
ActRadiocommunication Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Radiocommunication Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the RADIOCOMMUNICATION REGULATIONS in order to (1) address an issue identified by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations (SJCSR); (2) improve the clarity of the Regulations; and (3) update obsolete and unnecessary references contained within.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0278 Publication Date: 2020-12-23
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Radiocommunication Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the RADIOCOMMUNICATION REGULATIONS in order to (1) address an issue identified by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations (SJCSR); (2) improve the clarity of the Regulations; and (3) update obsolete and unnecessary references contained within.
